name: Kahitna
description: '''Kahitna''' (pronounced {{IPA|id|kaˈhɪtna|}}), is a music group from [[Bandung]], Indonesia. It was formed in 1986 and founded by [[Yovie Widianto]].  Although most of the songs contain love themes in the lyrics, the group is also well known to be able to combine elements of other music genres such as [[jazz]], pop, [[Jazz fusion|fusion]], [[Latin American music|Latin]] and even [[folk music|traditional]] music. The band adopted its name from a former jazz fusion group that Yovie Widianto was part of during his high school years, which changed its name to [[Indonesia 6]] to compete in Japan.
